about_the_game:
Last Hope is a combat-focused survival game where you need to protect the central village's people from nightly waves of enemies. The waves get harder each night, and as you unlock areas, new enemies will be introduced. You will unlock weapons throughout the days in-game, which will better prepare you for the different elemental type enemies. Don't let the villagers die, you are their "Last Hope".

Explore, Harvest, Fight, Die, Escape.



*NOTE*
No saving is in this game

This is our first game, so please let us know the bugs you find because there will definitely be some.
Thanks!

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
